description: Gearbox Software just wrapped up its Borderlands 4 State of Play, revealing 20 minutes of new gameplay and details from its highly anticipated looter shooter.
title: Borderlands 4 State of Play April 2025: Everything Announced

description: These are IGN's top picks for the best gaming cookbooks in 2025.

description: It’s the end of the fight for Sgt. Rock, the DC Studios World War 2 film that might have starred Penguin actor Colin Farrell as the titular character with director Luca Guadagnino at the helm and a script from Challengers and Queer scribe Justin Kuritzkes.
title: World War 2 DCU Film Sgt. Rock No Longer Moving Forward

description: If you're buying holiday gifts for a Star Wars fan, we have you covered with suggestions for movies, books, clothes, home decor, and more. A galaxy's worth of amazing merch!
title: The Best Star Wars Gifts for Adult Fans of the Franchise

description: IGN spoke with TMNT: The Last Ronin II writers Kevin Eastman and Tom Waltz to learn more about why the finale needed to end in tragedy for the new Turtles and to get an update on the status of the Last Ronin game and movie.
title: TMNT: The Last Ronin II Ends in Major Tragedy for the New Turtles

description: “When we say John Wick is pain, it’s kind of like a ‘fuck yeah.’” So declares Keanu Reeves in Wick is Pain, an upcoming documentary about the franchise featuring new interviews with Reeves, director Chad Stahelski, and more cast and crew who have worked on the four films.
title: Wick is Pain: Exclusive Trailer for the New Documentary Chronicling the John Wick Franchise

description: A fun twist on a classic game.

description: Don't skimp on something you use several hours per day.

description: Ubisoft has outlined its plans for the first year of post-launch content for Assassin’s Creed Shadows, including promises to add features like new game+, more difficulty settings, additional story content, and more. Here's everything you need to know.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Roadmap Includes Free Updates Driven by Community Feedback and DLC Details

description: Nintendo's new Virtual Game Card system is live now with the latest Switch update. For those looking to hide their game cards away from prying eyes, they'll have the option to do just that.
title: Nintendo's New Virtual Game Card System Will Let You Hide Game Cards From Your List

description: Blizzard is preparing to add a new feature to World of Warcraft that might sound strange at first: an option to have the game tell you what spell you should optimally cast next in combat, with an additional option to simply let the game cast the ideal next spell for you.
title: World of Warcraft Is Getting a One-Button Option That Will Automatically Cast the Ideal Next Spell — but at a Cost

description: 18 incredible animated movies in one collection.

description: Sony has announced the PlayStation Plus monthly games for May 2025.
title: Sony Announces PlayStation Plus Monthly Games for May 2025

description: There's certainly been no shortage of games in the last month or so, and it's easy for games to get lost in the proverbial avalanche. In a show of mutual admiration, though, two leads behind two RPGs, both of which launched in the same week, are promoting each others' games to fans.
title: The Developers Behind Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 and Hundred Line Recommend Playing Each Others' Games

description: The impeccable Shōgun, winner of a whopping 18 Emmy Awards and 4 Golden Globes, is making its way back for a second season — and the plans are underway. Cosmo Jarvis, who stars in the series as pilot John Blackthorn, has officially signed on to return to the role for Season 2, as well as to join the team as a co-executive producer, according to an official press release from FX.
title: Cosmo Jarvis to Return for Shogun Season 2, Set 10 Years After Season 1

description: Assassin’s Creed Shadows for Xbox Series X has received its first discount over at Woot, dropping its price from $69.99 to $54.99.
title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows Gets Its First Discount for Xbox Series X

description: Using firearms to fly through the air is a total blast.
title: Shotgun Cop Man Review

description: After years of struggle, Blizzard Entertainment has found itself in uncharted territory: Overwatch players are having fun again.
title: After Years of Struggle, Blizzard Has Found Itself in Uncharted Territory: Overwatch Players Are Having Fun Again

description: The latest Nintendo Switch system update is out, introducing new systems like the Virtual Game Cards ahead of the launch of Switch 2. Implementing that has closed off a method for playing the same digital game online across two systems at the same time, though.
title: Nintendo Switch Update Mostly Shuts Off a Well-Liked Loophole For Game Sharing

description: Call of Duty is steeped in 4/20 culture. It’s something Activision has monetized for years now, doubling down on the fanbase’s reputation for kicking back and relaxing while going for those killstreaks. But with Black Ops 6 and Warzone, the 4/20 microtransactions have leveled up, and now Seth Rogen is in the game some fans have had enough.
title: Call of Duty’s Ongoing 4/20 Obsession Sparks Debate Among Fans: Some Have Had Enough, Others Really Want That Seth Rogen Skin

description: Our up-to-date streaming guide on how to watch every Friday the 13th movie and reboot online.
title: Where to Stream Every Friday the 13th Movie Online in 2025

description: It’s a Minecraft world, folks — we’re just singing in it. A Minecraft Movie continues to hit major milestones a month after debuting in theaters and catapulting its way toward becoming the highest-grossing video game movie ever at the global box office. Now, the movie’s “Steve's Lava Chicken” song, sung by star Jack Black himself, has made its way to the coveted Billboard Hot 100 Chart in the United States. Yeah, you read that right.
title: Jack Black's 'Steve's Lava Chicken' Song From a Minecraft Movie Officially Hits the Billboard 100 Charts — the Shortest Ever

description: After an exclusive look at The Outer Worlds 2, this sequel isn’t just aiming to be bigger, it’s gunning to be a better RPG from every angle.
title: The Outer Worlds 2: The First Preview – IGN First

description: Following its ‘Mixed’ Steam early access reception, Game of Thrones: Kingsroad has a full release date.
title: Following ‘Mixed’ Steam Reception to Game of Thrones: Kingsroad Early Access, It Has a Release Date

description: One of the quintessential Great American Novels is being adapted to comics. Check out our exclusive preview of Abrams ComicArts' The Red Badge of Courage.
title: The Red Badge of Courage Translates a Beloved Novel Into a Harrowing Comic Book

description: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition on Nintendo Switch 2 is now 15% off in the UK, with preorders available for £59.99 ahead of its June launch.
title: You Can Preorder Cyberpunk 2077 on Nintendo Switch 2 For £59.99 in the UK

description: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered players are warning newcomers to do that Kvatch quest before the level scaling makes it an absolute nightmare.
title: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered Players Are Warning Newcomers to Do That Kvatch Quest Before the Level Scaling Makes It an Absolute Nightmare

description: We're just over a month away from the much-hyped arrival of Nintendo Switch 2, which means Nintendo has been busy behind the scenes, updating its OG Switch firmware and getting the eShop ready for June 5. Part of those changes, however, has evoked a surprisingly strong reaction in fans — the eShop has switched from orange to red.
title: 'RIP Orange eShop': Nintendo Fans Bid Farewell To Iconic Switch Color

description: PS5 and PC single-player action game Lost Soul Aside is delayed three months to add polish. Here's the updated release date.
title: PS5 and PC Single-Player Action Game Lost Soul Aside Delayed 3 Months to Add Polish

description: Actor Shinya Okada’s dramatic reaction to losing all his original Pokemon Red save data from 1996 was captured in a YouTube video. The actor’s stunned facial expressions and fans’ outpourings of sympathy even led the incident to be featured on Japanese entertainment news outlets.
title: Japanese Actor’s Dramatic Pokemon Save Data Loss Goes Viral, Triggering Traumatic Memories and Sympathy From Fellow Gamers

description: The Pokémon TCG: Journey Together Elite Trainer Box is down to $64.95 at Amazon (34% off its $97.99 list price), plus savings on AirPods Pro 2, Switch 2 accessories, and more.
title: Deals For Today: Pokémon TCG ETBs Are Back In Stock

description: Titanfall fans are reeling from the news EA has canceled another incubation project at Respawn Entertainment, and simultaneously laid off a number of individuals across its incubation, Apex Legends, Star Wars: Jedi, and EA Experience teams. Now, some are wondering if it's the final nail in the coffin for Titanfall 3 and the franchise.
title: Titanfall Fans React to Extraction Shooter Cancelation — Is This the Final Nail in the Coffin for Titanfall 3 and the Franchise?

description: Gearbox development chief Randy Pitchford has insisted the decision to release Borderlands 4 earlier than planned had nothing to do with any other game’s release date, amid speculation the shooter might have moved due to games such as Marathon or Grand Theft Auto 6.
title: Randy Pitchford Insists Borderlands 4’s Early Release Date Decision Was ‘Literally 0% About Any Other Product’s Actual or Theoretical Launch Date’

description: Nintendo has released a new firmware update for the Switch ahead of the release of the Switch 2. Nintendo Switch Firmware Update Version 20.0.0 makes a number of key changes to the eight-year-old console in preparation of the launch of its successor, the Switch 2, in June, according to the patch notes released on Nintendo's official website.
title: New Nintendo Switch Firmware Update Version 20.0.0 Redesigns Icons, Adds System Transfer to Nintendo Switch 2, and More

description: As Diablo 4 launches Season 8, IGN interviews Blizzard to get its response to roadmap and battle pass criticism, and to find out how it plans to update the skill tree.
title: As Diablo 4 Launches Season 8, Blizzard Responds to Roadmap Criticism, Reveals Plans to Update the Skill Tree, and Explains Controversial Battle Pass Changes

description: Exercise patience with this Argentine sci-fi import.
title: The Eternaut Review

description: The Walking Dead: Dead City is back with a leveled up Hershel and a clever, resourceful Negan, but still gets bogged down by forced interactions, endlessly shifting alliances, and action scenes so dark they numb the senses.
title: The Walking Dead: Dead City Season 2, Episodes 1-6 Review

description: With sales this good, your pile of shame's about to become a colossal pillar of discounts.
title: AU Deals: Score Lowest Ever Prices on Resi 4, Star Wars Outlaws, LEGO Marvel, and More!

description: The Empire and Rebellion struggle to stay in control of an exhausting conflict growing too big to manage, but chapter 2 of Andor’s second season is staying on top of it.
